Title: Azure SDK Release (July 2025)
EnhancedContent:
Thank you for your interest in the new Azure SDKs! We release new features, improvements, and bug fixes every month. Subscribe to our [Azure SDK Blog RSS Feed](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/azure-sdk/feed/) to get notified when a new release is available.

You can find links to packages, code, and docs on our [Azure SDK Releases page](https://aka.ms/azsdk/releases).

## Release highlights

### Azure AI Agents 1.0.2 for Python

The [Azure AI Agents library version 1.0.2](https://pypi.org/project/azure-ai-agents/1.0.2/) fixes a critical tracing bug that occurred during process termination when messages or run steps were listed but not fully iterated. This fix ensures more reliable operation of AI agents in production environments.

### Azure Storage libraries for Python

Multiple Azure Storage libraries received major updates with new features and improvements. The [Storage Blobs 12.26.0](https://pypi.org/project/azure-storage-blob/12.26.0/), [Storage Queues 12.13.0](https://pypi.org/project/azure-storage-queue/12.13.0/), [Storage Files Data Lake 12.21.0](https://pypi.org/project/azure-storage-file-datalake/12.21.0/), and [Storage Files Share 12.22.0](https://pypi.org/project/azure-storage-file-share/12.22.0/) libraries all received stable releases with enhanced functionality and bug fixes.

### Azure Key Vault libraries for Python

The Azure Key Vault suite received significant updates with support for API version 7.6. [Key Vault Keys 4.11.0](https://pypi.org/project/azure-keyvault-keys/4.11.0/) adds a new `get_key_attestation` method for retrieving keys with attestation blobs from managed HSMs, while [Key Vault Certificates 4.10.0](https://pypi.org/project/azure-keyvault-certificates/4.10.0/) introduces a `preserve_order` feature for maintaining certificate chain ordering during creation or import.

Description:
Azure SDK releases every month. In this post, you'll find this month's highlights and release notes.

The post [Azure SDK Release (July 2025)](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/azure-sdk/azure-sdk-release-july-2025/) appeared first on [Azure SDK Blog](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/azure-sdk).
Author: Ronnie Geraghty
